name: RegisterWebhookSubscription
description:
Register a new outbound webhook subscription.

This tool registers a new outbound webhook subscription. The newly registered subscription will be in a pending verification state, requiring verification with the provided challenge.

additional_headers.description: Optional headers to include with webhook requests. Max 5 headers, header names max 100 chars, values max 1000 chars.

endpoint_url.description: URL where webhook events will be sent

event_types.description: Events that this subscription will receive
